title: To Be Or Not To Be (Mel Brooks) [1983] nordic subs  DVDrip
description:

To Be Or Not To Be [1983]

A bad Polish actor is just trying to make a living when what should intrude but World War II in the form of an invasion. His wife has the habit of entertaining young polish officers while he's on stage which is also a source of depression to him. When one of her officers comes back on a Secret Mission, the actor takes charge and comes up with a plan for them to escape.

Re-make of the classical Ernst Lubitsch comedy from 1942, "To Be Or Not To Be" <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6613653/To_Be_Or_Not_To_Be_[1942]__nl__sv__no__da__fi__DVDrip" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6613653/To_Be_Or_Not_To_Be_[1942]__nl__sv__no__da__fi__DVDrip</a>

Starring: Mel Brooks, Anne Bancroft and Ronny Graham 
Director: Alan Johnson (Mel Brooks didn't direct this one but produced it)


Video: MPEG2PAL 16:9 720x576

Ausio: English Dolby AC3/2

Subs: Dansk, Norsk, Suomi, Svenska
